name: Will It Shred?
description:
What would you do if you had a shredder POWERFUL enough to SHRED ANYTHING?

Answer: SHRED EVERYTHING!!!

...with unbelievable REALISM you have to see to believe!

Upgrade your shredder for
- more damage
- more speed
- & more gold!

One of the best games out there for blowing off some steam:

- Shred more
- Earn more
- Buy more
- And then SHRED IT!

Install, sit back, relax, and let the shredder SHRED EVERYTHING!
